name: Diverge x Sinead Gorey Phygital Drop

metadata.name: Dress to Access
metadata.description: Diverge x Sinead Gorey”, the first phygital collab from Diverge, which is a next-Gen Metaverse fashion company, exploring the way of expressing a digital identity. It is a Manifesto about the obvious connection between IRL fashion and web 3, launched with a mission to speed up the process of connecting these two worlds. Digital twin “Dress to Access” is an entry level to join Diverge community and will unlock exclusive digital and physical benefits for each holder
